title: Please!!! Can you help me identifying this font?
author: Eleto18

comments.content:
Possibly Basic Commercial LT with too tight kern.  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/families/basic-commercial](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060559/http:/www.fontshop.com/families/basic-commercial)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sour1_5913.jpg)

[Akzidenz-Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060559/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/akzidenz+grotesk) should do the job too.  
For the record, Basic Commercial is just Linotype version of Akzidenz-Grotesk, simply renamed: [http://typophile.com/node/43625](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060559/http:/typophile.com/node/43625 "http://typophile.com/node/43625")
Thanks both. I'd found Akzidenz Grotesk as the right font. Whatever, both are genious!! :D
